pkgmetadata.longdescription: [deprecated] RESTful Google Cloud Client Library for Python===========================================================This repository has been deprecated -- please see `talkiq/gcloud-aio`_. Whatwas previously released as ``gcloud-rest`` (and its subprojects, such as``gcloud-rest-datastore``) is now autogenerated from the much more up-to-date``gcloud-aio`` repository... _talkiq/gcloud-aio: https://github.com/talkiq/gcloud-aio
